channel.title: short on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in short on Barefoot Rob

item.title: mt3 while ma watched
item.description: 08:14 Tuesday 22 August 2017 JST Ma watched while I added about 100 frames to the video. 00:58 Wednesday 23 August 2017 JST I have spent 1 day 8 hours on MT3 so far.

item.title: recently (soml)
item.description: 08:36 Friday 18 August 2017 JST Ma is in town! We are going to Nagano today Still don’t feel completely resolved regarding Renee and Gunma 20:43 Saturday 19 August 2017 JST Lin, Ma, and I just got home from Nagano it’s raining harder than it does during the misnamed/mistimed “rainy season” of the past couple of years. I recently created https://tokyo.mypowercircle.org/ to be the MKP website for Tokyo / Japan.
